wikipedia_page.main: William Samuel Booth (7 July 1920 – 18 February 1990) was an English football player and manager who played in the English Football League for Brighton & Hove Albion and Port Vale.

response: William or Bill Booth may also refer to:
*Bill Booth (footballer) (1920–1990), English football player and manager
*Bill Booth (ice hockey) (1919–1986), Canadian ice hockey player
